name: KN17 Wired Mechanical Number Pad- 17 Keys Hot Swappable Numpad with White Backlight& PBT Keycaps for Laptop PC Compact Keyboards (Black, Brown Switch)
short_description: 【Standard 17 Keys】With compact layout, the KN17 wired usb keypad has 17 independent keys including num lock key, convenient top-row shortcuts for backspace and calculator access. Mini size numeric keypad [4.41*3.39*1.38in] occupies minimal desk space while delivering essential functionality, making it the seamless companion for your laptop or TKL keyboard. Ideal for fast data entry, productivity tasks, or certain games.

【Universal Compatibility】The mechanical number pad connects via USB-C to USB-A supporting most operating systems such as Windows, Mac, Android. Enjoy stable and responsive performance for both work and personal use. It can be placed right beside your gaming keyboard on the desk, also conveniently on the left-hand side and stored in a drawer when not in use.

【PBT Dye-Sub Keycaps & White Backlighting】Featuring durable PBT Dye Sublimation Keycaps known for their premium texture and long-lasting legends that resist wear over time. White backlights shine around the PBT keycaps and edges, creates a customizable ambiance that caters to your preferences. Easily adjust lighting modes and brightness by simultaneously pressing Fn combination keys.

【Hot Swappable Brown Switches】You can hot-swap the numpad with almost of the 3 pin and 5 pin mechanical switches on the market. Pre-installed Outemu brown switches offer a quieter, tactile typing experience- ideal for office or shared spaces where noise matters. Enjoy the satisfying response and the freedom to easily swap in your preferred linear/clicky switches.

【Multi-layer Silencing Structure】Every Kisnt keyboard is designed with a multi-layered cushion to make typing easier on your fingers. The Poron bottom layer, combined with the sandwich foam and IXPE switch pad ensures every keystroke consistent. If you appreciate quality mechanical keyboards, you’ll love the refined feel and sound this keypad makes.

【Warm Tips】Kisnt KN17 cannot be programmed. The 10-key is not compatible with Chrome OS and has limited compatibility with Mac OS, the “Num Lock” key functions as “Clear”. The following functions are unavailable: Calculator, Home, End, Page Up, Page Down, Insert, Delete, and arrow keys.

【2 Years After-Sales Service】Any quality issues in 2 years? A new one on us. Every quality refinement runs through our research, development, production, marketing, and sales processes. We do everything right to get you obsessed with our keyboards.

name: Keychron K0 Max Wireless Low-Profile Number Pad, QMK/VIA Programmable, Hot-Swappable Red Switch, RGB Backlit, 2.4GHz & Bluetooth 5.3, 1000Hz Polling Rate, with Knob, for Windows/Mac
short_description: 27-Key Wireless Numpad: The Keychron K0 Max is a low-profile 27-key numpad with a macro column and rotary knob. Use it as a standalone numeric pad or a customizable keyset with QMK support. Featuring tri-mode wireless, hot-swap support, and acoustic foams, it boosts workflow and productivity.

Tri-Mode Connection: The K0 Max supports Bluetooth 5.3, 2.4 GHz wireless, and Type-C wired connections. Seamlessly switch between up to three devices, ensuring fast, stable, and flexible connectivity for both professional tasks and personal use across multiple setups.

Launcher Web Configurator: Powered by open-source QMK firmware, the K0 Max offers endless customization. Remap keys, set macros, and define shortcuts via the Keychron Launcher web app—no downloads required. Configure your numpad online anywhere with ease and total flexibility.

Hot-Swappable Milk POM Switches: Equipped with Keychron's Milk POM switches, engineered with POM and POK for a deep, resonant sound. Every switch is hot-swappable, allowing effortless customization without soldering—perfect for tailoring your typing and sound experience.

Dynamic RGB Backlights: With up to 22 RGB backlight effects, the K0 Max lets you match your setup to your mood. Easily fine-tune hue, saturation, brightness, and speed for a personalized lighting experience that enhances both work and play environments.

name: EPOMAKER EK21 VIA Gasket Number Pad with 1000mAh Battery, BT 5.0/2.4GHz/Wired Hot-Swap Numpad with Aluminum Alloy knob, Programmable for Win/Mac/Gaming (Black Silver, Zebra Switch)
short_description: EK21 VIA Gasket Numpad: Elevate your typing experience with the EK21 VIA Gasket Number Pad, a versatile and highly functional numeric keypad perfect for professionals and gamers alike. Featuring an advanced layout with 20 keys and a premium aluminum alloy knob, this hot-swappable numpad excels in both performance and aesthetics. With its robust construction, customizable RGB lighting, and exceptional battery life, the EK21 is designed to enhance productivity while offering seamless compatibility across various operating systems, including Windows, Mac, and Android. Experience the future of typing with a product that combines cutting-edge technology with user-centric design

A Tailored Experience for Your Workflow: In response to community feedback, the EK21 numpad offers robust programmability through VIA software, empowering you to fully customize and personalize each key according to your unique workflow and preferences. This innovative feature allows you to create intricate macros, effortlessly remap keys, and fine-tune your typing experience with ease. With the intuitive interface of VIA, you can take control of your productivity like never before. Whether you need to streamline repetitive tasks or optimize your gaming setup, the EK21 numpad provides versatility and adaptability to any situation

Triple Modes&1000mAh Large Capacity Battery: The EK21 offers exceptional versatility with its triple connectivity options. Choose from wired, BT, or 2.4GHz wireless modes to suit your preferences and enhance your productivity. This numpad is not just about connectivity; it also features a robust 1000mAh battery capacity, providing you with extended usage time without the inconvenience of frequent recharging. Enjoy consistent performance and stay focused on your tasks throughout the day, knowing that the EK21 is designed to keep up with your demands. Whether you're working at your desk or on the go, this device ensures seamless operation tailored to your needs

A Comfort-First Design: The EK21 keyboard has been meticulously crafted with your comfort as a top priority. Featuring a Poron bottom layer, this innovative design incorporates sandwich foam along with an IXPE switch pad to deliver an exceptionally cushioned typing experience. This thoughtful combination not only alleviates strain on your fingers during prolonged use but also significantly reduces noise, allowing for a quieter workspace. Say farewell to fatigue and distractions; the EK21 enables you to type with unparalleled ease and precision

Aluminum Alloy Knob & Finely Tuned Stabilizer: The EK21 features an elegant aluminum alloy knob that enhances your control with a refined touch. This innovative design allows for effortless volume adjustments, while the VIA software offers you the flexibility to customize the knob’s functionality to suit your personal preferences. The high-quality construction of the knob not only adds a sophisticated aesthetic to the numpad but also ensures smooth and precise modifications, elevating your user experience. Moreover, the EK21 is equipped with meticulously tuned stabilizers that have been engineered to provide consistent and satisfying key presses

PC Plate with CNC Cutting: The EK21 boasts a high-quality PC plate that has been meticulously crafted using CNC precision cutting techniques, followed by a refined sandblasting process. This results in an elegant and robust finish that not only enhances its aesthetic appeal but also contributes to the overall durability of the product. Complementing this are the front and back panels made from ABS plastic, designed without any oil coatings to ensure a pleasant tactile experience. The non-slip grip fosters comfort during extended use, making it ideal for daily tasks

name: Gasket Creamy Mechanical Numpad Programmable Macro Keypad Wireless 2.4G/Bluetooth 5.0/Wired USB-C RGB Backlit Hot Swappable Number Pad Rechargeable Numeric Keyboard Metal Knob for Win/Mac
short_description: [Tri-Mode Connection] - Powerful 3-mode connection supports Wireless 2.4GHz/Bluetooth 5.0/USB-C Wired. You can connect up to 3 bluetooth devices, 1 wireless 2.4GHz device and 1 wired device. Connect and switch devices easily. Press FN+1/2/3/4/5 switch to BT1/BT2/BT3/2.4G/Wired mode. Compatible with Windows, MacOS, IOS and Android systems. Support PC, laptop, Mac, smartphone, iPad and tablet.

[Gasket-Mount & Hot Swap] - With gasket materials such as EVA foam and IXPE switch pads between the plate and housing on both top and bottom sides, the mechanical numpad provides a consistent, softer typing feel and pleasing acoustic feedback. The hotswap keypad supports both 3 pin and 5 pin switches. Comes with creamy sounding linear Ice switches, brings you a comfortable and pleasant typing experience.

[18 Keys Programmable] - Program all 18 keys except the FN key using the keypad driver. Customize each key with different functions such as system shortcuts, multimedia shortcuts, text input, one-click open for files/folders/web pages, macros, and more. This numpad features memory capability, ensuring settings are retained even after power loss. (Keypad Driver: bit.ly/K19-Driver)

[True RGB Backlit & PBT Keycaps] - This RGB illuminated numeric keypad has up to 18 backlight modes. Supports RGB colors and single color. You can also customize the backlight and turn on the music rhythm mode in the driver. Comes with ultra-durable PBT keycaps that legends will never wear away. PBT keycaps are dry and not easy to get oily.

[19-Key NKRO & Multifunction Knob] - All 19 keys are anti-ghosting and non-conflict. Every keystroke is registered during intense gameplay and fast typing, no matter how many other keys are pressed at the same time. Turn the metal knob to adjust volume, click the knob for Esc. FN+Click the knob to switch to brightness mode, then turn the knob to adjust the backlight brightness.

[Rechargeable & Energy-Saving] - The number keypad has a 1500mAh lithium battery, with low-power chip and energy-saving technology, it can last between 30-60 days, depending on usage. Turn off the backlight automatically after 2 minutes of inaction. The keyboard goes to Hibernation Mode in 30 minutes of sitting idle to save battery, any key to wake up. Press FN+. to check the battery level.

name: FD17 Wireless Mechanical Number Pad, Bluetooth 5.0& 2.4G Dual Mode Numeric Keypad, 17 Keys Hot Swappable Numpad with PBT Keycaps for Laptop/PC/TKL Keyboards(Beige, Linear Switch)
short_description: 【Effortless Number Pad for Laptop Connecivity】Experience versatility with FD17 dual-mode connection: Bluetooth 5.0 and 2.4G wireless, allowing you to seamlessly switch between computers, laptops, MacBooks, iPads, tablets or smartphones. Powered by 1x AAA battery (NOT INCLUDED), stays cord-free and portable, simply replace the battery when low. With auto-sleep mode (press any key to wake up) for extended battery life.

【17 Keys Practical Layout】Compare to standard keypads, this bluetooth numpad extended enhanced independent Backspace and convenient shortcuts for ESC, Tab, Calculator. Complete numeric workspace- calculate, navigate, correct, and exit all from one device. Compact and space-saving (3.6 x 4.8 x 1.6 inches), perfect for office use and on-the-go professionals. Whether you’re working for spreadsheets, data entry, or accounting tasks, it’s got you covered with minimal latency.

【Widely Application】The wireless number pad works with almost all operating systems including Windows, Mac, IOS, Linux, Android. It can be placed right beside your gaming keyboard on your desk, also conveniently on the left-hand side and stored in a drawer when not in use. (NOTE: The 10 key is not compatible with Chrome OS and has limited functionality with Mac OS, as Apple systems do not support external function keys.)

【Hot-Swappable& PBT Dye-Sub Keycaps】You can easily hot-swap the mechanical numpad with almost of the 3 pin and 5 pin switches on the market. The durable PBT keycaps offer higher quality than ABS, more wear-resistant and long-lasting in texture. If you appreciate quality mechanical keyboards, you’ll love the refined feel this ten key makes.

【Gasket Mounted& Smooth Linear Switches】With its gasket-mounted design, five layers of sound-dampening foam, and silicone plate dampener, it delivers a "creamy" typing sound. Equipped with the pre-lubed Bsun linear switches(45-50gf actuation), ensures a consistent keystroke without tactile bumps or audible clicks.

【Warm Tips】The Kisnt FD17 number keypad features no backlight and cannot be programmed. It is recommended to use the 2.4G mode for Windows 7 or earlier versions. Bluetooth connectivity is only compatible with Windows 8 and above, Mac OS 10.10 or later.

【2 Years After-Sales Service】Any quality issues in 2 years? A new one on us. Every quality refinement runs through our research, development, production, marketing, and sales processes. We do everything right to get you obsessed with our keyboards.

name: Keychron Q0 Max Wireless Custom Mechanical Numpad, 2.4 GHz/Bluetooth 5.1/Wired QMK Number Pad, RGB Hot-Swappable with Gateron Banana Switch for Laptop Mac Windows Linux - Black
short_description: The Q0 Max is a full-metal custom number pad with a macro column and rotary encoder knob on the left side. Available as a separate numeric keypad or a huge customizable key set with QMK support, offering superior performance such as 2.4 GHz wireless, Bluetooth 5.1, 1000 Hz polling rate, PBT keycaps, and more for that premium thock feel.

The durable metal body is crafted with 6063 aluminum that is processed through CNC machined, polished, anodized, sandblasted, and undergoes 24 more manufacturing stages to make this solid metal piece of art that is the Q0 Max.

2.4 GHz and Bluetooth Connection - The 2.4 GHz wireless and wired connection boasts a rapid 1000 Hz polling rate. You can also connect the Q0 Max with up to 3 devices via a stable Bluetooth 5.1 for seamless multitasking.

Enhanced Thock Feel - Added a combination of premium acoustic foams such as IXPE, PET, and Latex. Together with our double-gasket design, screw-in stabilizers, and more. Each keystroke has become more enjoyable.

Change Every Switch with Ease - Hot-swap every switch on the Q0 Max with almost all the MX mechanical switches on the market without soldering required. Our KSA profile double-shot non-backlight shine through PBT keycaps will provide excellent oil resistance, enhanced typing feel, and keep the legends never fading out.
